Hey! Ki re, kemon achis? Bolli je bleeding disorders topic ta niye ektu help lagbe. Konobepar na, ami achi toh. Chol, ekdom simple kore bujhiye dichhi. Don't worry, topic ta interesting ache, bhalo kore bujhle puro clear hoye jabe. Ready?

Okay, so first of all, 'bleeding disorder' bojhar aage amader jante hobe je normal obosthay bleeding stop hoy ki kore. Ei process take bola hoy **Hemostasis**.

Basically, Hemostasis tinte main pillar er opor dariye ache:
1.  **Blood vessel:** First line of defense. Jokhon kothao kete jay, tokhon blood vessel ta nijei constrict kore, jate blood flow kome jay.
2.  **Platelets:** Era hocche choto choto soldier der moto. Injury howar shathe shathe ora oikhane ছুটে jaye aar ekta temporary plug toiri kore fele jate bleeding bondho hoy.
3.  **Clotting factors:** Platelet plug ta khub strong hoy na. Take strong korar jonno, ekta 'cement' er layer dorkar. Ei cement ta hocche Fibrin, aar ei Fibrin toiri hoy onek gulo clotting factors er ekta chain reaction er maddhome, jake amra boli **Coagulation Cascade**.

Bhab, ekta pipe (blood vessel) leak korche. Tokhon prothome kichu choto choto 'bricks' (platelets) ese temporary bhabe ota bondho korar chesta korbe. Tarpor 'cement' (clotting factors theke toiri Fibrin) eshe shei bricks guloke permanently seal kore debe.

Ebar ashi mechanism ta te. Jokhon blood vessel er bhitorer layer, **Endothelium**, damage hoy, tokhon tar thik nicher **Collagen** layer ta expose hoye jay. Ei exposed collagen dekhei platelets ra active hoye othe.

Kintu platelets direct collagen e lagte pare na. Tader ekta 'glue' or 'bridge' laage. Ei glue ta hocche **von Willebrand Factor (vWF)**. Platelet er opor ekta receptor thake, **GpIb**, sheta vWF er shathe bind kore. Eke bole **platelet adhesion**.

Ekbar platelet adhere korle, ora arek rokom er receptor, **GpIIb/IIIa**, express kore. Ei receptor gulo **Fibrinogen** er maddhome pashapashi platelets der shathe jure jete help kore. Eke bole **platelet aggregation**.

Shonge shonge **clotting cascade** o activate hoye jay, jate Fibrin toiri hoy aar ekta strong, permanent clot toiri hoy. Aar circulating blood e **Factor VIII** ke carry kore niye beray ei vWF. So vWF er duto kaaj - platelet adhesion e help kora aar Factor VIII ke stabilize kora.

Ei basic mechanism ta clear holo? Bol, kono osubidha ache kina etotukute?

Chal! Full focus e thak tahole.

Platelet disorders er por ebar amra aschi **Inherited Bleeding Disorders** e, jekhane main problem ta hocche **Clotting factor defect**. Ei group er shobcheye famous aar important example hocche **HEMOPHILIA**.

Hemophilia te ki hoy? Platelet plug to toiri hoy, kintu coagulation cascade ta thik moto complete hote pare na, karon kono ekta specific clotting factor kom thake ba thakei na. Fole, permanent je Fibrin clot ta toiri howar kotha, sheta toiri hote onek deri hoy ba hoy na. Aar tar jonno bleeding manifestations dekha jay.

Ebar ashi Hemophilia r **TYPES** e. Kono factor ta absent, tar opor depend kore main tinte type hoy.

| Type | Clotting factor deficiency | Mode of inheritance |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| Hemophilia A (**m/c**) | Factor VIII | X-linked recessive (males are affected more) |
| Hemophilia B | Factor IX | X-linked recessive (males are affected more) |
| Hemophilia C | Factor XI | Autosomal recessive |

Chol table ta ektu bujhi:
*   **Hemophilia A**: Eta shobcheye common (**m/c**) type. Ekhane **Factor VIII (eight)** er deficiency thake.
*   **Hemophilia B**: Eke **Christmas Disease** o bola hoy. Ekhane **Factor IX (nine)** er deficiency thake.
*   **Hemophilia C**: Eta comparatively rare. Ekhane **Factor XI (eleven)** er deficiency thake.

Ebar aay **Mode of Inheritance** e.
Hemophilia A and B, dutoi holo **X-linked recessive** disorder. Er maane ki? Ei disorder er jonno responsible gene ta X chromosome e thake.
Meyeder duto X chromosome thake (XX), aar cheleder ekta X aar ekta Y (XY).
Jodi ekta X chromosome e faulty gene ta thake, taholeo meyeder arekta healthy X chromosome thake, jeta situation ta manage kore ney. Tai meyera usually carrier hoy, tader moddhe disease ta manifest kore na.
Kintu cheleder toh ektai X chromosome. Sheta jodi faulty hoy, tahole or ar kono backup nei. Tai disease ta manifest kore. Ei karonei Hemophilia A and B te **males are affected more**.

On the other hand, Hemophilia C hocche **Autosomal recessive**. Maane er gene ta autosome e thake (sex chromosome chara onno chromosome). Tai eta chele meye dujonkei equally affect korte pare.

Ebar ashi **Clinical Features** e.
Hemophilia'r **hallmark feature** hocche **Hemarthrosis**, maane **bleeding into a joint**. Platelet disorder e jemon mucocutaneous bleeding dekha jay, ekhane temni joint bleeding is the main problem. Patient ra hotath kore ekta joint e probol betha, fule jawa niye ashe.
*   Shobcheye common kon joint affect hoy? **Knee** (haantu) > elbow (konui) > ankle (gorali). (NEET PG important)
*   Ekta term ache **Target joint**. Er maane hocche, jokhon ek'i joint e bar bar bleeding hote thake. Bar bar bleeding howar fole, joint er bhetor inflammation hoy, **fibrosis** hoy (tissue gulo shokto hoye jay), aar aste aste joint ta permanent bhabe damage hoye jay. Er fole **restriction of joint movements** hoy. Ekjon Hemophiliac patient er shobcheye boro morbidity'r karon kintu ei joint damage.

Imagine kor, haantu ta jodi bhitore bleeding hoye fule shokto hoye jay, she ki ar normal bhabe haat te parbe? Parbe na. Eta'i tader life er main struggle.

Ei basic concept of Hemophilia, er types aar clinical feature ta bujhte parli? Joint bleeding keno hoy, clear holo?
